text: Penukonda Junction (station code:PKD) is the primary railway station serving Penukonda in Andhra Pradesh, India. The station comes under the jurisdiction of Bangalore division of South Western Railways. The station has two platforms. The station is situated at junction of three lines branching towards Dharmavaram, Sathya Sai Prasanthi Nilayam and Yesvantpur. ==References== Category:Bangalore railway division Category:Railway junction stations in Andhra Pradesh Category:Railway stations in Anantapur district
title: Penukonda Junction railway station
